content.text:
# Travels & Traditions

| last_aired           =
| num_seasons          = 22
| creator              =
| presenter            = Burt WolfNicholas Wolf
}}
Travels & Traditions is a television series hosted by Burt Wolf and his son [https://www.instagram.com/nicholaswolftv/ Nicholas Wolf]. The series began airing in 2000 and is currently in its 22nd season. The New York Times described it as “the best food, travel, and cultural history shows on television.” The programs are broadcast on Public Television to 90% of the television homes in the United States, then translated into Russian, Polish, Ukrainian, Romanian, Bulgarian, Mandarin and Korean and syndicated to an international audience of over 100 million. [https://www.instagram.com/nicholaswolftv/ Nicholas Wolf] joined Burt Wolf in the 22nd season of the series.
